title: Can anyone give music to my song? I have written lyrics. - Quora

response.answer_text: I can. But it depends upon the language and what the advantage of doing it for me. I need more details. Actually I am not a professional and I have a Casio keyboard and some digital items only. See my own composed stuffs for some songs then decide.
Hey dear Navagnyana, I would try to give music to your lyrucs. Please write to me: stasique@list.ru Best regards, Stanislav
